name: Eric Lo 0001
content: Eric Lo's Homepage | Chinese University of Hong Kong News [Feb 2025]: 2 PHD position for 2026 August available. News [Sep 2025]: 1 PHD position for 2026 August left. Applications please follow here. Selected Services: SIGMOD Program Committee (2026, 2025, 2024, 2022, 2021, 2019 demo, 2018, 2017 demo, 2016, 2014, 2012) VLDB Program Committee (2023-25 associate editor, 2021, 2019 demo, 2018 demo, 2017, 2015, 2014, 2013) AAAI Program Committee (2024, 2023, 2021) The VLDB Journal Associate Editor (2024 – ) SOCC Program Committee (2025, 2024, 2023, 2022, 2020) CVPR Program Committee (2025) ICDE Program Committee (2026 area chair, 2024, 2023, 2022, 2021, 2020 demo, 2019 demo, 2018 vice chair, 2016, 2015, 2014, 2013, 2012) CIKM Program Committee (2018 senior pc, 2017 pc chair (short paper), 2013, 2012 IEEE BigData Program Committee (2020, 2018 senior pc, 2017 senior pc, 2016, 2015) KDD Program Committee (2012) EDBT Program Committee (2023, 2021, 2019/2020 senior pc, 2018 demo, 2017, 2016, 2015, 2012) DBTest Program Committee (2020, 2018, 2012 pc chair) ICDE Student Travel Award Selection Committee (2014) ACM TODS, TKDE, TSE, TC Reviewer Awards: VLDB Distinguished Associate Editor Awards 2023, 2025 ACM SIGMOD Best Demo Award (Honorable Mention) 2022 ACM SIGMOD Research Highlight Award 2021 DASFAA 2014 Best Paper ICDE 2012 Best Paper Honorable Mention VLDB 2005 Best Paper Honorable Mention
